# Knowledge Base Operations Handbook

## Workflow 1
Section 1: The knowledge graph subsystem tracks provenance, confidence, and semantic lineage for retrieval-augmented generation workflows. It stores typed entities, relations, and temporal snapshots while supporting replay-safe updates and deterministic ingestion checkpoints for auditability.
